title: VICTORY: The SCOTUS Gun Rights Decision That Will Save Lives | Guests: Tim Barton & Josh Hammer | 6/23/22
description:
As the Supreme Court is set to release the final decisions, Glenn and Stu review the remaining cases and discuss how the Biden administration will grab power illegally. Why has the IRS purchased hundreds of thousands of dollars' worth of ammunition? Glenn's executive producer Rikki Ratliff shares a devastating story of a Texan father suing a school district for allegedly failing to protect his daughter. It's a good day for the Constitution, as SCOTUS released a decision in favor of the Second Amendment. President of WallBuilders Tim Barton joins to talk about the American Journey Experience and what's being taught. Opinion editor for Newsweek Josh Hammer joins to discuss the latest SCOTUS decisions, including the massive win for gun rights.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
